Job Posting Title:

Plant Finance Manager

About Us:

TreeHouse Foods (NYSE: THS) is a leading manufacturer of private label packaged foods and beverages, operating a network of production facilities across the United States and Canada. At TreeHouse Foods, our commitment to excellence extends beyond our products and revolves around our people. We are investing in talent and creating a performance-based culture where employees can do their best work, directly impacting our mission to make high quality, affordable food for our customers, communities and families. We hope you will consider joining the team and being part of our future.

What You Gain:

Competitive compensation and benefits programEnrollment in our wellness and employee assistance programsPaid holidays, vacation, and other competitive paid time off opportunitiesAn inclusive working environment where you can build meaningful work relationships with a diverse group of people Leaders who are invested in supporting your career growthOpportunities to be recognized for outstanding contributions to your team through our employee recognition programs

Job Description:

About the Role:

The Plant Finance Manager role at the Forest Park location is accountable for Plant Finance operation to develop and monitor the required financial systems, policies, procedures, and reports to provide a framework to support the Plant planning, accounting, financial reporting, continuous improvement (participation and tracking), and safeguarding of the company’s assets (internal controls). The Plant Finance Manager is responsible for all financial and accounting functions of the facility. In addition to guiding the work of others this is a hands-on position for the development and maintenance of the budgeting and cost accounting program. The Plant Finance Manager is responsible for the following:

Provide financial analysis and insights to support informed decision-making and provide Plant Management with financial information and financial projections to assist in management of operational results and ensure integration into business plans and strategiesLead Monthly closings; prepare and review all General Journals, review period and cut offs for Sales/AR, Cash, Inventory, AP, etc., review the general ledger, prepare, analyze, review, and report the Monthly Financial StatementsReview and approve AP invoices for payment; review balance sheet and fixed asset ledgerReview cost and inventory issues, book to physical inventory differences, bill of material changes, standard cost and daily/weekly production reportsOversee the review and approval of capital projects; oversee and manage internal and external auditsStay current on industry trends and regulations to ensure compliance with financial reporting standards

Important Details: This is a full-time permanent role with responsibilities across multiple shifts which operate Monday – Friday with occasional overtime on Saturday and/or Sunday. This role has three salaried direct reports.

About You:

You’ll fit right in if you have:

Bachelor’s Degree required (MBA is preferred)5+ years of increasing responsibilities in plant accounting and financeProficient in the use of: Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and excellent verbal and written communication skillsProven track record in driving change and profit improvement; familiarity / knowledge of accounting terminology and concepts

Your TreeHouse Foods Career is Just a Click Away!

Click on the “Apply” button or go directly to www.treehousefoods.com/careers to let us know you’re ready to join our team!

TreeHouse Use Only: #IND1

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
